description: white hawk at C perched on a horizontal bar; bird's leg is tethered by red and green cords that hang below; background is light gray above and rust color gradient below bird; brown damask border with floral pattern; plain gray silk at top and bottom of mount; bone roller knobs (one is detached); two decorative ties at top; hanging cord
inscription: inscription in Japanese at BR; light writing verso at bottom: SFHT-2 (Japanese script)
markings: red seal in BR; paper tag attached to T verso: STOCK NO. T-10-D /.../ MADE IN JAPAN
medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, and gofun on silk
signed: 行年八十四歳法眼探雲筆; red seal unread
title: Tethered white hawk
